S04bsu012_u:1_0: oṃ namaḥ sarvajñāya / namo bhagavate bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabharājāya tathāgatāya //
S04bsu012_u:2_0: evaṃ mayā śrutam / ekasmin samaye bhagavān janapadacaryāṃ caramāṇo 'nupūrveṇa yena vaiśālī mahānagarī tenānuprāpto 'bhūt /
S04bsu012_u:2_1: tatra khalu bhagavān vaiśālyāṃ viharati sma vādyasvaravṛkṣamūle mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdham aṣṭabhirbikṣusahasraiḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadbhiś ca bodhisattvasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ rājāmātyabrāhmaṇagṛhapatisaṃhatyā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyaparṣadā ca parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
S04bsu012_u:2_2: atha khalu mañjuśrīr dharmarājaputro buddhānubhāvenotthāyāsanād ekaṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam etad avocat - deśayatu bhagavaṃs teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ nāmāni,
S04bsu012_u:2_4: vayaṃ śrutvā sarvakarmāvaraṇāni viśodhayema paścime kāle paścime samaye saddharmapratirūpake vartamāne sattvānām anugraham upādāya /
S04bsu012_u:2_5: atha bhagavān mañjuśriye kumārabhūtāya sādhukāram adāt - sādhu sādhu mañjuśrīḥ,
S04bsu012_u:2_7: tvam aprameyāṃ karuṇāṃ janayitvā samādhesase(?) nānākarmāvaraṇenāvṛtānāṃ sattvānām arthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇāṃ ca hitārthāya /
S04bsu012_u:2_8: tena hi tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru,
S04bsu012_u:2_9: bhāṣiṣye / evaṃ bhagavan, iti mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
S04bsu012_u:3_0: asti mañjuśrīḥ pūrvasmin digbhāge ito buddhakṣetrād daśagaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇy atikramya vaidūryanirbhāsā nāma lokadhātuḥ /
S04bsu012_u:3_1: tatra bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabho nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho viharati vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiś ca śāstā devānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān/
S04bsu012_u:3_2: tasya khalu punar mañjuśrīḥ bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ carata imāni dvādaśa mahāpraṇidhānāny abhūvan /
S04bsu012_u:3_3: katamāni dvādaśa mahāpraṇidhānāni? prathamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt yadāham anāgate 'dhvani anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeyam,
S04bsu012_u:3_4: tadā mama śarīraprabhayā aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇā lokadhātavo bhrājeraṃs tapyeran viroceran /
S04bsu012_u:3_8: / (dvitīyaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt - yadāham anāgate 'dhvani anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeyam,
S04bsu012_u:3_9: tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me kāyaḥ anarghavaidūryamaṇir iva antarbahiratyantapariśuddho vimalaprabhāsaṃpannaḥ syāt /
S04bsu012_u:3_10: vipulakāyas tadupamena śriyā tejasā ca pratyupasthitaḥ syāt /
S04bsu012_u:3_11: tasyāṃśujālāni raviśaśikarānatikrameyuḥ te ca ye kecit sattvā lokadhātau jātāś ca,
S04bsu012_u:3_12: ye cāpi puruṣāḥ, te tamisrāyāṃ ratrāvandhakāre nānādiśaṃ gaccheyuḥ /
S04bsu012_u:3_13: sarvadikṣu mama ābhayāṃ spṛṣṭāḥ kuśalāni ca) karmāṇi kurvīran /
S04bsu012_u:3_15: Vaidya 166) yadāham anāgate - - - - - - tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye sattvā aprameyaprajñopāyabalādhānena aparimāṇasya sattvadhātor akṣayāyopabhogāya paribhogāya syuḥ /
S04bsu012_u:3_16: kasyaci(t) sattvasya kenacid vaikalyaṃ na syāt /
S04bsu012_u:3_17: / caturthaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā bodhiprāpto 'haṃ ye kumārgapratipannāḥ sattvāḥ śrāvakamārgapratipannāḥ pratyekabuddhamārgapratipannāś ca,
S04bsu012_u:3_18: te sattvā anuttare bodhimārge mahāyāne niyojayeran /
S04bsu012_u:3_19: / pañcamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye sattvā mama śāsane brahmacaryaṃ careyuḥ,
S04bsu012_u:3_22: mama nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā kvacid durgatigamanaṃ syāt /
S04bsu012_u:3_23: / ṣaṣṭhaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye sattvā hīnakāyā vikalendriyā durvarṇā jaḍaiḍamūkā laṃgāḥ kubjāḥ śvitrāḥ kuṇḍā andhā badhirā unmattā ye cānye śarīrasthavyādhayaḥ,
S04bsu012_u:3_24: te mama nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā sarve sakalendriyāḥ suparipūrṇagātrā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu012_u:3_25: / saptamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye nānāvyādhiparipīḍitāḥ sattvā atrāṇā aśaraṇā bhaiṣajyopakaraṇavirahitā anāthā daridrā duḥkhitāḥ,
S04bsu012_u:3_26: sace(t) teṣāṃ mama nāmadheyaṃ karṇapuṭe nipatet,
S04bsu012_u:3_28: nīrogāś ca nirupadravāś ca te syur yāva bodhiparyavasānam /
S04bsu012_u:3_29: / aṣṭamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā yaḥ kaścin mātṛgrāmo nānāśtrīdoṣaśataiḥ saṃkliṣṭaṃ strībhāvaṃ vijugupsitaṃ mātṛgrāmayoniṃ ca parimoktukāmo mama nāmadheyaṃ dhārayet,
S04bsu012_u:3_30: tasya mātṛgrāmasya na strībhāvo bhavet yāva bodhiparyavasānam /
S04bsu012_u:3_31: / navamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā bodhiprāpte 'haṃ sarvasattvān mārapāśabandhanabaddhān nānādṛṣṭigahanasaṃkaṭaprāptān sarvamārapāśadṛṣṭigatibhyo vinivartya samyagdṛṣṭau niyojya ānupūrveṇa bodhisattvacārikāṃ saṃdarśayeyam /
S04bsu012_u:3_32: / daśamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūta - - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye kecit sattvā rājādhibhayabhītāḥ,
S04bsu012_u:3_33: ye vā bandhanabaddhāvaruddhāḥ vadhārhā anekamāyābhir upadrutā vimānitāś ca kāyikavācikacaitasikaduḥkhairabhyāhatāḥ,
S04bsu012_u:3_34: te mama nāmadheyasya śravaṇena madīyena puṇyānubhāvena ca sarvabhayopadravebhyaḥ parimucyeran /
S04bsu012_u:3_35: / ekādaśamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūta - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye sattvāḥ kṣudhāgninā prajvalitāḥ āhārapānaparyeṣṭyabhiyuktāḥ tannidānaṃ pāpaṃ kurvanti,
S04bsu012_u:3_37: ahaṃ teṣāṃ varṇagandharasopetena āhāreṇa śarīraṃ saṃtarpayeyam /
S04bsu012_u:3_38: / dvādaśamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye kecit sattvā vasanavirahitā daridrāḥ śītoṣṇadaṃśamaśakrairupadrutā rātriṃdivaṃ
S04bsu012_u:3_39: duḥkham anubhavanti, sace(t) te mama nāmadheyeṃ dhārayeyuḥ,
S04bsu012_u:3_42: (BhgSū, Vaidya 167) vividhaiś ca ratnābharaṇagandhamālyavilepanavādyatūryatālāvacaraiḥ sarvasattvānāṃ sarvābhiprāyān paripūrayeyam /
S04bsu012_u:3_43: / imāni dvādaśa mahāpraṇidhānāni mañjuśrīḥ bhagavān bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ pūrvaṃ bodhicārikāṃ caran kṛtavān /
S04bsu012_u:4_0: tasya khalu punar mañjuśrīḥ bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya yat praṇidhānaṃ yac ca buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaṃ tan na śakyaṃ kalpena vā kalpāvaśeṣeṇa vā kṣapayitum /
S04bsu012_u:4_1: suviśuddhaṃ tad buddhakṣetraṃ vyapagataśilāśarkarakaṭhalyam apagatakāmadoṣam apagatāpāyaduḥkhaśabdam apagatamātṛgrāmam /
S04bsu012_u:4_4: tatra vaidūryanirbhāsāyāṃ lokadhātau dvau bodhisattvau mahāsattvau teṣām aprameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pramukhau,
S04bsu012_u:4_5: ekakaḥ sūryavairocano nāma, dvitīyaś candravairocanaḥ, yau tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya saddharmakośaṃ dhārayataḥ /
S04bsu012_u:4_6: tasmāt tarhi mañjuśrīḥ śrāddhena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā tatra buddhakṣetropapattaye praṇidhānaṃ karaṇīyam /
S04bsu012_u:5_0: punaraparaṃ bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtam āmantrayate sma - santi mañjuśrīḥ pṛthagjanāḥ sattvāḥ,
S04bsu012_u:5_2: te lobhābhibhūtā ajānanto dānaṃ dānasya ca mahāvipākam,
S04bsu012_u:5_4: na ca dānasaṃvibhāge teṣāṃ cittaṃ kramate /
S04bsu012_u:5_5: dānakāle upasthite svaśarīramaṃsacchedane iva vā manaso (duḥkhaṃ) bhavati /
S04bsu012_u:5_6: aneke ca sattvāḥ ye svayam eva na paribhuñjanti,
S04bsu012_u:5_9: prāgevānyeṣāṃ yācakānām, te tādṛśāḥ sattvā itaś cyutvā pretaloke upapatsyante tiryagyonau vā /
S04bsu012_u:5_10: yaiḥ pūrvaṃ manuṣyabhūtaiḥ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyam,
S04bsu012_u:5_11: tatra teṣāṃ yamalokasthitānāṃ tiryagyonisthitānāṃ vā tasya tathāgatasya nāma su(saṃ?)mukhībhaviṣyati /
S04bsu012_u:5_12: saha smaraṇamātreṇa ataś cyutvā punar api manuṣyaloke upapatsyante,
S04bsu012_u:5_13: jātismarāś ca bhaviṣyanti / te te durgatibhayabhītā na bhūyaḥ kāmaguṇebhir arthikā bhaviṣyanti,
S04bsu012_u:5_14: dānābhiratāś ca bhaviṣyanti dānasya ca varṇavādinaḥ /
S04bsu012_u:5_15: sarvam api parityāgenānupūrveṇa karacaraṇaśīrṣanayanaṃ ca māṃsaśoṇitaṃ (ca) yācakānām anupradāsyanti,
S04bsu012_u:6_0: punar aparaṃ mañjuśrīḥ santi sattvāḥ ye tathāgatānuddiśya śikṣāpadāni dhārayanti,
S04bsu012_u:6_1: te śīlavipattim āpadyante, dṛṣṭivipattim ācāravipattiṃ vā kadācid āpadyante /
S04bsu012_u:6_3: śīlaṃ rakṣanti, na punar bahuśrutaṃ paryeṣyanti,
S04bsu012_u:6_4: na ca tathāgatabhāṣitānāṃ gambhīram artham ājānanti /
S04bsu012_u:6_5: ye ca punar buhuśrutāḥ, te ādhimānikā bhaviṣyanti mānastabdhāḥ,
S04bsu012_u:6_7: mārapakṣikās te tādṛḥā mohapuruṣāḥ svayaṃ kumārgapratipannāḥ /
S04bsu012_u:6_9: teṣām evaṃrūpāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ bhūyiṣṭhena narakavāsagatir bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu012_u:6_10: tatra (BhgSū, Vaidya 168) yais tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ ḥrutaṃ bhaviṣyanti,
S04bsu012_u:6_11: teṣāṃ tatra narake sthitānāṃ buddhānubhāvena tasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ sumukhībhaviṣyati /
S04bsu012_u:6_12: te tataḥ cyutvā punar api manuṣyaloke upapatsyante samyagdṛṣṭisaṃpannā vīryavantaḥ kalyāṇāḥayāḥ /
S04bsu012_u:6_13: te gṛhān utsṛjya tathāgataḥāsane pravrajitvā ānupūrveṇa bodhisattvacārikāṃ paripūrayiṣyanti /
S04bsu012_u:7_0: punar aparaṃ mañjuśrīḥ santi sattvāḥ ye ātmano varṇaṃ bhāṣante matsariṇaḥ,
S04bsu012_u:7_2: ātmotkarṣakaparapaṃsakāḥ sattvāḥ parasparasatkṛtvāḥ tryapāyeṣu bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi duḥkham anubhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu012_u:7_3: te anekavarṣasahasrāṇām atyayena tataś cyutvā gavāśvoṣṭragardabhādiṣu tiryagyoniṣu upapadyante /
S04bsu012_u:7_4: kaśādaṇḍaprahāreṇa tāḍitāḥ kṣuttarṣapīḍitaśarīrā mahāntaṃ bhāraṃ vahamānā mārgaṃ gacchanti /
S04bsu012_u:7_8: yaiḥ pūrvaṃ manuṣyabhūtais tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu012_u:7_10: tīkṣṇendriyāś ca bhaviṣyanti paṇḍitā vyaktā meghāvinaś ca /
S04bsu012_u:8_0: punar aparaṃ mañjuśrīḥ santi sattvāḥ ye paiśunyābhiratāḥ sattvānāṃ parasparaṃ kalahavigrahavivādān kārāpayanti /
S04bsu012_u:8_1: te parasparaṃ vigrahacittāḥ sattvā nānāvidhamakuśalam abhisaṃskurvanti kāyena vācā manasā,
S04bsu012_u:8_2: anyonyam ahitakāmā nityaṃ parasparam anarthāya parākrāmanti /
S04bsu012_u:8_3: te ca vanadevatām āvāhayanti vṛkṣadevatāṃ giridevatāṃ ca /
S04bsu012_u:8_7: tasya śatror nāma vā śarīrapratimāṃ vā kṛtvā tatra ghoravidyāṃ sādhayanti kākhordavetālānuprayogeṇa jīvitāntarāyaṃ vā śarīravināśaṃ vā kartukāmāḥ /
S04bsu012_u:8_8: yaiḥ punas tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu012_u:8_10: sarve ca te parasparaṃ maitracittā hitacittā avyāpannacittāś ca viharanti svakasvakena parigraheṇa saṃtuṣṭāḥ /
S04bsu012_u:9_0: punaraparaṃ mañjuśrīḥ etāś catasraḥ parṣado bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāḥ,
S04bsu012_u:9_1: ye cānye śrāddhāḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā āryāṣṭāṅgaiḥ samanvāgatā upavāsam upavasanti,
S04bsu012_u:9_2: ekavārṣikaṃ vā traimāsikaṃ vā śikṣāpadaṃ dhārayiṣyanti,
S04bsu012_u:9_3: yeṣām evaṃpraṇidhānam evamabhiprāyam - anena vayaṃ kuśalamūlena paścimāyāṃ diśi sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau upapadyema yatrāmitāyus tathāgataḥ /
S04bsu012_u:9_4: yaiḥ punas tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu012_u:9_5: teṣāṃ maraṇakālasamaye aṣṭau bodhisattvā ṛddhyāgatā upadarśayanti,
S04bsu012_u:9_11: te tataś cyutvā iha manuṣyaloke upapatsyante /
S04bsu012_u:9_13: te anekāni sattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyanti /
S04bsu012_u:9_14: apare punaḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakuleṣu brāhmaṇamahāśālakuleṣu prabhūtadhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgārasamṛddheṣu ca kuleṣu upapatsyante /
S04bsu012_u:9_18: yaś ca mātṛgrāmaḥ tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā ca udgrahīṣyati,
S04bsu012_u:9_19: tasya sa eva paścimaḥ strībhāvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ /
S04bsu012_u:10_0: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantam etad avocat - ahaṃ bhagavan paścime kāle paścime samaye teṣāṃ śrāddhānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrāvayiṣyāmi,
S04bsu012_u:10_1: antaśaḥ svapnāntaram api buddhanāmakaṃ karṇapuṭeṣu upasaṃhārayiṣyāmi /
S04bsu012_u:10_2: ye idaṃ sūtraratnaṃ dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti deśayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
S04bsu012_u:10_4: likhiṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti, pustakagataṃ vā kṛtvā satkariṣyanti nānāpuṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanachatradhvajapatākābhiḥ,
S04bsu012_u:10_5: tat pañcaraṅgikavastraiḥ pariveṣṭya śucau pradeśe sthāpayitavyam /
S04bsu012_u:10_8: anyāni ca anekāni ca devakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi upasaṃkramiṣyanti /
S04bsu012_u:10_10: te ca bhagavan idaṃ sūtraratnaṃ prakāśayiṣyanti /
S04bsu012_u:10_11: tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūrvapraṇidhānaviśeṣavistaravibhāgaṃ ca tasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti,
S04bsu012_u:10_14: hṛtaṃ vā ojaḥ punar api pratisaṃharati /
S04bsu012_u:10_16: evam etat, yathā vadasi / yaś ca mañjuśrīḥ śrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tasya tathāgatasya pūjāṃ kartukāmaḥ,
S04bsu012_u:10_19: śucinā śucim āhāraṃ kṛtvā śucau pradeśe (nānāpuṣpāṇi saṃstārya nānāgandhapradhūpite nānāvastracchatradhvajapatākāsamalaṃkṛte tasmin pṛthivīpradeśe susnātagātreṇa śucivimalavasanadhāriṇā nirmalacittena akaluṣacittena avyāpādacittena sarvasattveṣu maitracittena (upekṣācittena) sarvasattvānām antike samacittena bhavitavyam /
S04bsu012_u:10_20: nānātūryasaṃgītipravāditena sā tathāgatapratimā pradakṣiṇīkartavyā tasya tathāgatasya pūrṇapraṇidhānāni manasi kartavyāni /
S04bsu012_u:10_22: yaṃ cetayati, yaṃ prārthayati, taṃ sarvābhiprāyaṃ paripūrayati /
S04bsu012_u:10_23: yadi dirgham āyuḥ kāmayate, dirghāyuṣko bhavati / yadi bhogaṃ prārthayate, bhogasamṛddho bhavati / yadi aiśvaryam abhiprārthayate,
S04bsu012_u:10_24: bhavati, putraṃ pratilabhate / ye iha pāpakaṃ svapnaṃ paśyanti,
S04bsu012_u:10_25: yatra vāyasaḥ sthito bhavati durnimittaṃ vā,
S04bsu012_u:10_27: tais tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūjā kartavyā /
S04bsu012_u:11_0: punar aparaṃ mañjuśrīḥ ye śrāddhāḥ kulaputrā va kuladuhitaro vā ye yāvajjīvaṃ triśaraṇam upagṛhṇanti,
S04bsu012_u:11_1: ananyadevatāś ca bhavanti, ye pañca śikṣāpadāni dhārayanti,
S04bsu012_u:11_6: ye ca yathāparigṛhītāc chikṣāsaṃvarād anyatarāc chikṣāpadāt bhraṣṭā bhavanti saced durgatibhayabhītāḥ,
S04bsu012_u:11_7: tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ dhārayeyuḥ,
S04bsu012_u:11_9: yaś ca mātṛgrāmaḥ prasavanakāle tīvrāṃ duḥkhāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ vedayati,
S04bsu012_u:11_10: yā tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyam anusmaret,
S04bsu012_u:11_11: pūjāṃ ca kuryāt, sā sukhaṃ ca prasūyate, sarvāṅgaparipūrṇaṃ putraṃ (ca) janayiṣyati abhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyas tīkṣṇendriyo buddhimān /
S04bsu012_u:11_13: na ca śakyate amanuṣyais tasya ojo 'pahartum /
S04bsu012_u:12_0: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma - śraddadhāsi tvam ānanda pattīyasi yad ahaṃ tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya guṇān varṇayiṣyāmi? athavā te kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vā atra gambhīre buddhagocare? athāyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat - na me bhadanta bhagavan atra kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vā tathāgatabhāṣiteṣu sūtrānteṣu /
S04bsu012_u:12_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? nāsti tathāgatānām apariśuddhakāyavāṅbhanaḥsamudācāratā /
S04bsu012_u:12_2: imau bhagavan candrasūryau evaṃ maharddhikau evaṃ mahānubhāvau pṛthivyāṃ prapatetām,
S04bsu012_u:12_3: sa sumerur vā parvatarājaḥ sthānāc calet,
S04bsu012_u:12_4: na tu buddhānāṃ vacanam anyathā bhavet /
S04bsu012_u:12_5: kiṃ tu bhadanta santi sattvāḥ śraddhendriyavikalāḥ /
S04bsu012_u:12_6: idaṃ buddhagocaraṃ śrutvāṃ evaṃ vakṣyanti katham etan nāmadheyasmaraṇamātreṇa tasya tathāgatasya tāvanto guṇānuśaṃsā bhavanti? te na śraddadhanti na pattīyanti,
S04bsu012_u:12_7: pratikṣipanti/ teṣāṃ dīrgharātram anarthāya na hitāya na sukhāya vinipātāy bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu012_u:12_11: nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate / duḥśraddhānīyaṃ ca ānanda buddhānāṃ buddhagocaram /
S04bsu012_u:12_14: abhūmir atra sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ sthāpayitvā ekajātipratibaddhān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān iti /
S04bsu012_u:12_18: tasya bhagavatas tathāgatasya bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya ānanda bodhisattvacaryām apramāṇam,
S04bsu012_u:12_22: Vaidya 171) kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā bodhisattvacārikāyāṃ vistaravibhaṅgaṃ nirdiśeyam /
S04bsu012_u:12_23: kṣīyeta ānanda alpam, na tv eva śakyaṃ tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūrvapraṇidhānaviśeṣavistarāntam adhigantum /
S04bsu012_u:13_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayena tasyām eva parṣadi trāṇamukto nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃnipatito 'bhūt saṃniṣaṇṇaḥ /
S04bsu012_u:13_1: utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam etad avocat - bhaviṣyanti bhadanta bhagavan sattvāḥ paścime kāle paścime samaye nānāvyādhiparipīḍitā dīrghavyādhinā (kṣīṇagātrāḥ) kṣuttarṣābhyāṃ śuṣkakaṇṭhoṣṭhā maraṇābhimukhā rorudyamānebhir mitrajñātisālohitaiḥ parivāritā andhakārāṃ diśaṃ paśyanto yamapuruṣair ākarṣyamāṇāś ca /
S04bsu012_u:13_2: tasya kalevare mañcaśayite vijñānaṃ yamasya dharmarājasyāgratām upanīyate /
S04bsu012_u:13_3: yac ca tasya sattvasya sahajānubaddham eva yat kiṃcit tena puruṣeṇa kuśalam akuśalaṃ vā kṛtaṃ bhavati,
S04bsu012_u:13_4: tat sarvaṃ sulikhitaṃ kṛtvā yamasya dharmarājasya upanāmyate /
S04bsu012_u:13_6: gaṇayati yathākṛtaṃ cāsya kuśalam akuśalaṃ vā tathājñāmājñāpayati /
S04bsu012_u:13_7: tatra ye te mitrajñātisālohitāstasyāturasyārthāya taṃ bhagavantaṃ bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhaṃ tathāgataṃ śaraṇaṃ gaccheyuḥ,
S04bsu012_u:13_9: sthānam etad vidyate yat tasya tad vijñānaṃ punar api pratinivarteta,
S04bsu012_u:13_11: yadi vā saptame divase yadi vā (ekaviṃśatime) divase yadi vā pañcatriṃśatime divase yadi vā ekonapañcāśatime divase tasya vijñānaṃ punar api nivarteta,
S04bsu012_u:13_12: smṛtim upalabheta / tasya kuśalam akuśalaṃ vā karmavipākaṃ svayam eva pratyakṣaṃ bhavati /
S04bsu012_u:13_13: jñātvā sa jīvitahetau na kadāpi pāpam akuśalaṃ karma kariṣyati /
S04bsu012_u:13_14: tasmāc chrāddhena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitā vā tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūjā kartavyā /
S04bsu012_u:14_0: athāyuṣmān ānandas trāṇamuktaṃ nāma bodhisattvam etad avocat - kathaṃ kulaputra tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya pūjā kartavyā? trāṇamukto bodhisattva āha - ye bhadanta ānanda mahato vyādhitaḥ parimocitukāmāḥ,
S04bsu012_u:14_1: tais tasyāturasyārthāya sapta divasāni āryāṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatam upavāsam upavasitavyam,
S04bsu012_u:14_2: bhikṣusaṃghasya ca āhārapānaiḥ sarvopakaraṇair yathāśakti pūjopasthānaṃ kartavyam /
S04bsu012_u:14_3: bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya nāmadheyaṃ triṣkṛtvā rātryāṃ triṣkṛtvā divase manasi kartavyam /
S04bsu012_u:14_6: sapta pratimāḥ kartavyā / ekaikayā pratimayā sapta sapta dīpāḥ prajvālayitavyāḥ /
S04bsu012_u:14_8: yadi ekonacatvāriṃśatime divase āloko na kṣīyate,
S04bsu012_u:14_9: veditavyaṃ sarvasaṃpaditi / pañcaraṅgikāḥ patākāḥ ekonapañcāśadadhikāḥ kartavyāḥ /
S04bsu012_u:15_0: punar aparaṃ bhadanta ānanda yeṣāṃ rājñāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktānām upadravā vā upasargā vā pratyupasthitā bhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu012_u:15_1: vyādhipīḍā vā svacakrapīḍā vā paracakrapīḍā vā nakṣatrapīḍā (BhgSū,
S04bsu012_u:15_2: Vaidya 172) vā candragrahasūryagrahapīḍā vā akālavātavṛṣṭipīḍā vā avagrahapīḍā vā samutthitā,
S04bsu012_u:15_3: amāṅgalyā vā saṃkrāmakavyādhir vā vipad vā samupasthitā,
S04bsu012_u:15_4: tena rājñā kṣatriyeṇa mūrdhābhiṣiktena sarvasattveṣu maitracittena bhavitavyam,
S04bsu012_u:15_6: tasya ca bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya yathāpūrvoktapūjā karaṇīyā /
S04bsu012_u:15_7: tadā tasya rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya etena kuśalamūlena ca tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūrvapraṇidhānaviśeṣavistareṇa tatra viṣaye kṣemaṃ bhaviṣyati subhikṣam /
S04bsu012_u:15_9: sarve ca viṣayanivāsinaḥ sattvā ārogāḥ sukhitāḥ pramodyabahulāḥ /
S04bsu012_u:15_10: na ca tatra viṣaye duṣṭayakṣarākṣasabhūtapiśācāḥ sattvānāṃ viheṭhayanti /
S04bsu012_u:15_12: tasya ca rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya āyurvarṇabalārogyaiśvaryābhivṛddhir bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu012_u:16_0: athāyuṣmān ānandas trāṇamuktaṃ bodhisattvam evam avocat - kathaṃ kulaputra parikṣīṇāyuḥ punar evābhivivardhate? trāṇamukto bodhisattva āha - nanu tvayā bhadanta ānanda tathāgatasyāntikāc chrutam - santi akālamaraṇāni /
S04bsu012_u:16_2: santi sattvā vyādhitāḥ / na ca guruko vyādhiḥ bhaiṣajyopasthāpakavirahitaḥ /
S04bsu012_u:16_8: caturtham akālamaraṇaṃ ye agnidāhena kālaṃ kurvanti /
S04bsu012_u:16_9: pañcamaṃ cākālamaraṇaṃ ye ca udakena mriyante /
S04bsu012_u:16_10: ṣaṣṭhakālamaraṇaṃ ye (siṃha)vyāghravyālacaṇḍamṛgamadhyagatā vāsaṃ kalpayanti mriyante ca /
S04bsu012_u:16_13: navamam akālamaraṇaṃ ye kṣuttṛṣopahatā āhārapānam alabhamānā ārtāḥ kālaṃ kurvanti /
S04bsu012_u:17_0: atha khalu tatra parṣadi dvādaśa mahāyakṣasenāpatayaḥ saṃnipatitā abhūvan yaduta kiṃbhīro nāma mahāyakṣasenāpatiḥ,
S04bsu012_u:17_12: ete dvādaśa mahāyakṣasenāpatayaḥ ekaikānucaraparivāritā ekakaṇṭhena bhagavantam evam āhuḥ - śrutam asmābhiś ca bhagavatā buddhānubhāvena tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyam /
S04bsu012_u:17_14: te vayaṃ sahitāḥ samagrā yāvajjīvaṃ buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmaḥ,
S04bsu012_u:17_15: dharmaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmaḥ, saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmaḥ / sarvasattvānām arthāya hitāya sukhāya autsukyaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
S04bsu012_u:17_16: yo viśeṣeṇa grāme vā (BhgSū, Vaidya 173) nagare vā janapade vā araṇyāyatene vā edaṃ sūtraṃ pracārayiṣyati,
S04bsu012_u:17_17: yo vā tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya nāmadheyaṃ dhārayiṣyati,
S04bsu012_u:17_18: pūjopasthānaṃ kariṣyati, tāvat taṃ sattvaṃ rakṣiṣyāmaḥ,
S04bsu012_u:17_21: atha khalu bhagavāṃs teṣāṃ yakṣasenāpatīnāṃ sādhukāram adāt - sādhu sādhu mahāyakṣasenāpatayaḥ,
S04bsu012_u:17_22: yad yūyaṃ tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya kṛtajñatām anusmaramāṇānāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ hitāya pratipannāḥ /
S04bsu012_u:18_0: athāyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat - ko nāmāyaṃ bhagavan dharmaparyāyaḥ? kathaṃ cainaṃ dhārayāmi? bhagavān āha - tena hi ānanda dharmaparyāyam idaṃ bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūrvapraṇidhānaviśeṣavistaram iti dhāraya,
S04bsu012_u:19_0: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanā mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ,
S04bsu012_u:19_1: āyuṣmāṃś ca ānandaḥ, trāṇamukto bodhisattvaḥ, te ca bodhisattvāḥ, te ca mahāśrāvakāḥ, te ca rājāmātyabrāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ,
S04bsu012_u:19_2: sarvāvatī parṣat, sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan /
